name: Snappy and Casper
description:
Snappy and Casper is a puzzle platformer where you take control of two animal friends in order to solve puzzles and retrieve the missing hats of the locals. Features:
  • Isometric 3D Puzzle Platforming
  • Grid Based Movement
  • Physics Based Puzzles
  • Over 10 Challenges!
  • Keyboard and Gamepad Input Support*
Made by a Small Team: Mitch Campbell Connor Galy Adam O'Donoghue

The game is still in ongoing development and there are known issues that still need to be solved, however we hope you enjoy what we have so far.
*This game is best played with a controller and supports almost all gamepad inputs.
*Note: Mouse inputs may be required in certain sections of the current build
